modShortDescription: Players now leave behind a corpse block on death. Great for multiplayer servers, especially PvP, but also just for people who die a lot.
modDescription:
Thanks to Tehkarma for the idea; players now leave behind a corpse block on death. Great for multiplayer servers, especially PvP, but also just for people who die a lot.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/saminal1/samsmods-a20/tree/main/SKarmahRemains)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/26324-sams-stuff-all-a20-server-side-modlets/).

**Credits:** [Saminal](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/saminal/)
